code: @Manual{,   title = {BTFr: Run the Bayesian Transfer Function},   author = {Niamh Cahill},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://ncahill89.github.io/BTFr/}, }

title: Run the Bayesian Transfer Function
text: package requires installation JAGS software. Click download JAGS.

title: Run the Bayesian Transfer Function
text: package currently cran can download Github. Make sure devtools package installed execute following: can load BTF package using library function.

title: Run the Bayesian Transfer Function
text: See Vignette.

title: Run the Bayesian Transfer Function
text: options use package default contain data New Jersey, USA. Alternatively, can supply data. supplying data, use package defaults templates formatting. ’ll find details vignette.

title: Read in JAGS objects — ConstructMCMCArray
text: Read JAGS objects constructs mcmc.array, saved output.

title: Read in JAGS objects — ConstructMCMCArray
code: ConstructMCMCArray(   ChainIDs,   n.samplestot.max = 15000,   core.run = FALSE,   use.informative.priors = FALSE,   temp_files )

title: Read in JAGS objects — ConstructMCMCArray
text: ChainIDs Optional: specify chains include (use want exclude chain crashed, finished yet). n.samplestot.max Maximum number posterior samples save core.run Set TRUE running core data use.informative.priors Set TRUE using informative priors temp_files temporary JAGS files

title: Read in JAGS objects — ConstructMCMCArray
text: Invisible

title: Create Species Response Curves — response_curves

title: Run the core model — run_core
text: Run core model

title: Run the core model — run_core
code: run_core(   obj,   core_species = NULL,   prior_el = NULL,   ChainNums = seq(1, 3),   n.iter = 15000,   n.burnin = 1000,   n.thin = 7,   validation.run = FALSE,   use_uniform_prior = FALSE )

title: Run the core model — run_core
text: obj object class BTFr run_modern core_species Dataframe containing core species counts prior_el prior elevations available ChainNums number MCMC chains n.iter number MCMC iterations n.burnin number burnin MCMC samples n.thin number thinning validation.run Set TRUE running validation use_uniform_prior change prior elevation uniform

title: Run the core model — run_core
text: Output saved output.dir

title: Run the modern (calibration) model — run_modern
text: Run modern (calibration) model

title: Run the modern (calibration) model — run_modern
code: run_modern(   modern_elevation = NULL,   modern_species = NULL,   scale_x = FALSE,   sigma_z_priors = NULL,   dx = 0.1,   ChainNums = seq(1, 3),   n.iter = 40000,   n.burnin = 10000,   n.thin = 15,   validation.run = FALSE,   fold = 1 )

title: Run the modern (calibration) model — run_modern
text: modern_elevation dataframe modern elevations modern_species dataframe modern counts (sorted sort_modern) scale_x Set TRUE scale elevation data mean 0 sd 1 sigma_z_priors priors foram variability (available) dx elevation interval spacing spline knots. Defaults 0.2 ChainNums number MCMC chains run n.iter number iterations n.burnin number burnin samples n.thin number thinning validation.run Defaults FALSE. Set TRUE running validation fold Fold number cross validation (CV)

title: Run the modern (calibration) model — run_modern
text: Nothing returned, relevant data saved.

title: Run the modern (calibration) model — run_modern

title: Carry out a validation — run_valid
text: Carry validation

title: Carry out a validation — run_valid
code: run_valid(   modern_elevation = NULL,   modern_species = NULL,   n_folds = 1,   use_uniform_prior = FALSE,   dx = 0.2,   modern.iter = 40000,   modern.burnin = 10000,   modern.thin = 15,   core.iter = 15000,   core.burnin = 1000,   core.thin = 7,   scale_x = FALSE )

title: Carry out a validation — run_valid
text: modern_elevation dataframe modern elevations modern_species dataframe modern counts (sorted sort_modern) n_folds Number folds CV use_uniform_prior change prior elevation uniform dx elevation interval spacing spline knots. Defaults 0.2. modern.iter number iterations modern model modern.burnin number burnin samples modern model modern.thin number thinning modern model core.iter number iterations core model core.burnin number burnin samples core model core.thin number thinning core model scale_x Set TRUE scale elevation data mean 0 sd 1
